page.title: 14B.N.F.L. ALCAN HIGH DUTY LTD
page.content: {British Nuclear Fuels}Ltd has its main complex at Sellafield where they generate electricity and re-process spent nuclear fuel from all over the world.The Lillyhall factory machines graphite to go into power stations. There are 94 men and 7 women.They get their raw materials from near Sheffield and France near the Swiss border.The average wage is Â£150 per week. There is a day shift and a night shift.{Alcan High Duty Alloys {Extrusions.The}factory opened in 1940. It was the first factory on the Lillyhall Industrial Estate.The people make Aluminium Alloy Extrusions.There are 598 Men and 48 Women.The goods are sold world wide.The average wage is about Â£150 per week.There are 4 shifts morning afternoon nights and days.At AHDAE they make parts for the space shuttle and Concorde.
